Class ALU

java.lang.Object
  ALU
All Implemented Interfaces:
ALU_Operations
public class ALU
extends java.lang.Object
implements ALU_Operations

Simulates the ARC CPU ALU and condition code bits.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
C. Vickery

Method Detail

do_op

static int do_op(int A,
                 int B,
                 byte func)
Does an ALU operation and sets the condition codes if appropriate.

Parameters:
A - The operand received from the A Bus.
B - The operand received from the B Bus.
func - The function code, as listed in Figure 6-4 of the textbook.
Returns:
The result of the operation.
